fingertree 0.0.1
  • Reference

Package index

Core API

User-facing tree construction and updates

empty_tree()
Create an empty finger tree
tree_from()
Build a tree from a vector or list
prepend()
Prepend an element
append()
Append an element
concat_trees()
Concatenate two trees
add_monoids()
Add/merge monoids on an existing tree

Query API

Folds and locate/split queries

reduce_left()
Reduce from the left
reduce_right()
Reduce from the right
locate()
Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees
split_tree()
Split tree around first predicate flip
split()
Split tree into left and right parts

Types

Monoid and predicate constructors

MeasureMonoid()
Construct a MeasureMonoid
Predicate()
Construct a split predicate wrapper

Indexing

Vector-like extraction and replacement

`[`(<FingerTree>)
Subset a finger tree by position or element name
`[[`(<FingerTree>)
Extract one element by position or unique name
`[<-`(<FingerTree>)
Replace selected elements by position or name
`[[<-`(<FingerTree>)
Replace one element by position or unique name

Visualization

get_graph_df()
Build graph data frames for a finger tree
plot_tree()
Plot a finger tree with igraph
